name: LastTask
description:
In search of an idea for the game, I went to a website with an idea generator, after a few minutes of searching, I met an interesting story "Originally NASA was an organization for studying the deepest parts of the sea. However, they found something there to make them decide to go into space instead...." and seeing this immediately started looking for a way to implement this idea.

 Also, if you are interested in game development, I invite you to our discord with a friend, because we want to create our own community. https://discord.gg/y2vygZwAEM

Hope you'll enjoy this game!
